import './App.css' import '../src/css/layout.css' import '../src/css/spacing.css' import Header from './components/Header' import Filter from './components/Filter' import Table from './components/Table' import Modal from './components/Modal' import TasksListProvider from '../src/contexts/TasksListContext' import useTasksList from '../src/hooks/useTasksList' function App() { const { totalCredits, totalDebits, showModal, setShowFiltro, showFiltro, balance, setShowModal, } = useTasksList() return ( {showModal && }
{showFiltro && } {}

) } export default App
